docs.snippet: Elaborate presentations, lunches, dinners and parties are part of the television upfronts, when the networks present their fall programming hoping to seal $9 billion in ad sales....
docs.lead_paragraph: Elaborate presentations, lunches, dinners and parties are part of the television upfronts, when the networks present their fall programming hoping to seal $9 billion in ad sales.
docs.abstract: Ad buyers who work for agencies on behalf of large corporations hold most power during week of television upfronts; first day of week for Carrie Drinkwater, ad buyer for MullenLowe Mediahub, consists of attending upfronts, schmoozing at fancy lunches and dinners, and attending party hosted by network.

headline.main: An Ad Buyer’s Busy Day as a Target of the TV Upfronts
headline.print_headline: 18 Hours of Food, Drink and Lots of Television

docs.snippet: An announcement supporting a transgender student’s use of the restroom of his choice has divided students and parents in Chester....
docs.lead_paragraph: An announcement supporting a transgender student’s use of the restroom of his choice has divided students and parents in Chester.
docs.abstract: Fight over transgender people and public bathrooms has landed in Chester, Vt, with decision by transgender student A J Jackson to use boys' bathroom at Green Mountain Union High School sparking protests on both sides; issue has taken on intensely personal tone in small town, dividing students who were once friends and pitting resident against resident as they haggle over societal rules.

headline.main: Transgender Bathroom Debate Turns Personal at a Vermont High School
headline.print_headline: Bathroom Debate Turns Personal in Small Town

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Green Mountain Union High School (Chester, Vt)
